# Animals
The wastes contain both ordinary wildlife and smaller mutated critters.
- **Molerats & Pigrats**: Burrowing pests that swarm prey. Provide small amounts of meat when butchered. - **Feral Dogs**: Packs of wild dogs that bite for 4 damage. Hostile to most factions. - **Chickens, Rabbits and Iguanas**: Harmless food sources often kept by settlers. - **Brahmin**: See the Mutants page for details on these two-headed cattle.
While many animals can be hunted or even tamed, be alert for disease or radiation carried by the more unfortunate specimens.
